column3: but still going to go back for another try.  My chicken was VERY PINK inside
column4: which made my godmother shy away from eating it.  When I called the restaurant to complain
column5: they assured me that it was smoked for 2 hours
column7: and that it was customary for it to have that pink hue....The manager apologized and said that he would reimburse me for the chicken
column8: but that transaction it yet to be completed and it's well over 2 months
